Name: L'Heritage
Ingredients: 10 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Express orange zest twist over cocktail and discard. Garnish with maraschino cherry.
Review: Also, try this apéritif-style, bittersweet cocktail served on the rocks.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2015 by Pierre-Marie Bisson at Basement Sate in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of L'Heritage contains 198 calories
